ru.yandex.money.tools.grafana.dsl.variables

Class BaseVariable

  • ru.yandex.money.tools.grafana.dsl.variables.BaseVariable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Json<J>, Variable

    public class BaseVariable
implements Variable

    Basic data of a variable, e.g. name and type.

    It's recommended to use this class as some variable implementation's delegate (see class VariableWithQuery for example).

    Mutable builder is not provided for this class because it's not recommended to use this class as is.

    See Also:
    class VariableWithQuery

    • Constructor Detail

      • BaseVariable

        public BaseVariable(java.lang.String name,
                    java.lang.String type,
                    java.lang.String displayName,
                    HidingMode hidingMode)

        Basic data of a variable, e.g. name and type.

        It's recommended to use this class as some variable implementation's delegate (see class VariableWithQuery for example).

        Mutable builder is not provided for this class because it's not recommended to use this class as is.

        Parameters:
        name - name of a variable. You can refer to variable via this name.
        type - type of a variable
        displayName - display name of a variable. This name will be used as a label for variable at dashboardwhen HidingMode.NONE is used. When this value is missed so name will be used for variable label.
        hidingMode - hiding mode of a variable
        name - name of a variable. You can refer to variable via this name.
        type - type of a variable
        displayName - display name of a variable. This name will be used as a label for variable at dashboard when HidingMode.NONE is used. When this value is missed so name will be used for variable label.
        hidingMode - hiding mode of a variable
        See Also:
        class VariableWithQuery

        public java.lang.String getName()

        name of a variable.

        You can refer to variable via this name.
